allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Complete Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics textbook

- Implement all 6 chapters covering Physical AI fundamentals
- Add comprehensive content for robot components, perception, motion planning, manipulation, and advanced topics
- Create SVG diagrams with accessibility features for each chapter
- Configure Docusaurus site with custom styling and navigation
- Add TextbookChapters component for card-based chapter display
- Update README with complete textbook information
- Set up proper project structure with specs, plans, and tasks

The textbook is now complete with all required features:
- Accessible content with learning objectives and exercises
- Responsive design for all devices
- Clean navigation and user interface
- GitHub Pages ready configuration

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Update Docusaurus config for GitHub Pages deployment

- Update organization name to Saifullah899
- Update project name to Robotic-book
- Update base URL to /Robotic-book/
- Update all GitHub links to use correct repository URL

This prepares the site for proper GitHub Pages deployment.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add Vercel configuration for Docusaurus deployment

- Configure vercel.json with proper rootDirectory pointing to ''website'' folder
- Set framework to ''docusaurus'' for automatic build configuration
- Add proper routing with filesystem handler and fallback to index.html for SPA routing
- Configure builds to use @vercel/static-build with distDir set to ''build''

This enables proper Vercel deployment for the Docusaurus site.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''

- Keep only valid ''builds'' and ''routes'' properties for Vercel configuration
- Ensure proper configuration for Docusaurus static site deployment

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
